channel.title: Whats wrong with it
channel.description: My comp, just random like disables itself..like the icons on it when i try to click its like it doesnt click...but my mouse moves and stuff...can someone help me, if i have a program loaded i can't close it either..please...someone help...this is annoying,,, everytime it happens i have to restart my comp to use it again, and sometimes that doesnt even work...

item.title: Whats wrong with it
item.dc:creator: @Evil1 Evil_
item.description:
@Evil1 wrote:

i think my comp is down for the count…still doing it…[br][size=1]Posted at: July 13, 2006, 08:15:10 PM[/size][hr]found a virus…in aryan, was some trojan, it said successfully deleted, hope that helped…

Read full topic
